author: Dylan Mulenex
comment: Clearly a work in progress but you can do so much with it! However it IS crashing VERY often. Using a 1st Gen moto 360 and a Galaxy Avant SM-G386T *EDIT* Oh and the coordinates don't seem to correlate to each other.

author: Tim Nielsen
comment: Seems like a good app, with a lot of options, but i have yet to finish a face, before the app crashes. i9305, rooted stock rom.  Edit - App seems a bit more stable with the original System DPI. Could still use some more documentation regarding expressions. Seems like there are more possibilities here, than are presented in the actual list of available expressions. Edit, runs flawlessly on custom ROM.  Seems to be a week ahead of my calendar though, could be an issue with the whole week 1 starts on jan.1. or the first monday after jan.1. Turns out this is also dependant on the ROM I am using.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Hi tim. When does this error occur? Please write an email to support@wearable-software.com and we will help you to fix this problem. Please update your review. Thank you.

author: Justin Finton
comment: Liked it so much I bought it.  Best one out there.  It looks complicated, and took 10 min to figure out some of the text stuff, but it was worth it for how well it works.  I've made 2 so far and they are better than anything I've seen in other apps.

author: Stephen Boyd
comment: Brilliant app but it would really help if there was some documentation, I have discovered that conditional (if) statements exist but not sure exactly how they are formatted or how I can alter the true/false that it returns

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Hi please visit http://wiki.watchface-builder.com to get a detail documentation. Please review again. Thank you.

title: Great app

author: Emerson Gochuico
comment: I suggest developer to study sony SW2 interface. Please add option for phone battery, walk counter of google fit and message preview tnx
title: Nice but needs improvement

author: James Murphy
comment: Gutted paid £3.99 for the app,  looking forward to some nice designs however I only get 6. Unable to refund
title: Only 6 designs

author: Blitz Comet
comment: Its awesome but why does it need so many permissions such as Location and GPS and how would I send directly to my watch as a default so I won't have to use the app every time to switch. Also what features are on the premium version that make it better then the free version?

author: iam cavie
comment: Its not to bad, keeps time well, just wish it had more functions ie; sadly it doesnt have the step counter, phone battery, etc.

comment: Easy to start but not a simple way to create complex faces.

comment: Works Well on Sony Smart Watch 3 and Motorola phone.  But how do you get rid og the "OK Google" on the watchface?

author: Grampa Caligula
comment: I like the ease in which I can create any watch face I like.  I wish it were easier to select watch hands from a collected list.

comment: The only app I found to put a custom image for my clock :)

comment: This app has no free watch faces like a rolex watch faces

comment: Won't send the watch face to my gear s3

comment: I got the paid version.  Works great to design cool custom watch faces.

comment: Watch
title: Huawei

author: Kendall Short
comment: Great app
title: Love it

author: Phil Curtis
comment: Good app

author: J
comment: **Although for some reason when trying to change the color to anything other than white on the 'Dimmed Screen' changes it on the phone interface. But for some reason it doesn't send the change to the watch.** Alas other than that it does everything I want, and simply! I don't see a need to look for another watch face creator. Especially with this price point. Thanks for making this app.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: You have to send the change to watch in the preview screen. Please review again. Thank you.

title: Exactly What I Need. (LG G Watch)

author: The Degu Rangers
comment: Don't waste your time downloading. It doesn't open past the guide screen and crashes every time you try to create your own watch face. Apparently the paid for version doesn't have this problem.....but are you dumb enough to buy it to see?

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Please reinstall the app. A lot uf users don't have this issue. So there might be a device specfic problem. Write to support@wearable-software.com and we will fix the issue. Please review again. Thank you.

title: Crashes when opening editor.

author: Simon Stanisauskis
comment: This does the job as intended but doesn't really offer anything exciting and actually seems less featured than its rival Watchmaker pro,  it lacks shadow effects, tinting linked to time or other numerical value to allow colour changing over time and more. I'm using the free version and really do not see incentive to buy premium other than being able to save more than one watch, but since I don't find it particularly inspiring even on advanced mode, I think I may just go back to Watchmaker pro.
title: It's OK

author: TJ Jax
comment: Bought the premium version and it keeps stopping. Im uninstalling and would like a refund.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Please describe when does it stop? Did you install the newest version? If you have further problems please contact support@wearable-software.com

comment: Easy to use but can you make temperature a whole number?

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Yes. We will fix this in the next update. Thank you very much for your feedback.
